last_episode_to_air.name: Return to the Pride Lands
last_episode_to_air.overview: When the Lion Guard returns to the Pride Lands, they discover Vitani has formed her own Lion Guard in their absence.

name: The Lion Guard
overview: Simba's son, Kion, assembles a group of animals to protect the Pride Lands, known as the Lion Guard.

episodes.name: Never Judge a Hyena By Its Spots
episodes.overview: When Kion gets separated from the rest of the Lion Guard, he finds himself lost in the Outlands where he meets Jasiri, a friendly female hyena, who rescues him and helps face off against Janja and the other hyenas.

episodes.name: The Rise of Makuu
episodes.overview: When a crocodile named Makuu takes over as leader of the crocodiles and his aggressive antics send the Pride Lands into chaos, Kion questions whether to intervene or respect animal traditions.

episodes.name: Bunga the Wise
episodes.overview: After floodwaters threaten the Pride Lands and Bunga comes up with a quick fix, Kion and the other members of the Lion Guard learn that the quick and easy solution to a problem is not always the best.

episodes.name: Can't Wait to Be Queen
episodes.overview: When Simba leaves Kiara in charge of Pride Rock for the first time, Kion reluctantly agrees to obey her which proves difficult when Janja tries to take advantage of Kiara’s inexperience and hatches a plot to take over the Pride Lands.

episodes.name: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: Ono temporarily loses vision in one eye and questions his value to the Lion Guard as the "keenest of sight."

episodes.name: The Kupatana Celebration
episodes.overview: Kion inadvertently leads a pack of jackals into the Pride Lands, where they wreak havoc during a highly regarded Pride Lands ceremony. Ana Gasteyer (ABC’s “The Goldbergs”) guest stars as Rairai, the clever and scheming matriarch to a family of jackals.

episodes.name: Fuli's New Family
episodes.overview: The Guard thinks that Fuli is lonely since she spends so much time on her own; they try to include her in their family time.

episodes.name: The Search for Utamu
episodes.overview: Fuli learns a lesson in teamwork when she takes on a mission alone and overexerts herself, leaving her defenseless against attacking vultures.

episodes.name: Follow That Hippo!
episodes.overview: Beshte rescues a young elephant that idolizes him after he wanders into danger.

episodes.name: The Call of the Drongo
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard steps in when they encounter a deceptive drongo bird named Tamaa who mimics predators to scare off smaller animals.

episodes.name: Paintings and Predictions
episodes.overview: Believing that Rafiki's paintings predict the future, Bunga enlists the rest of the Lion Guard to save Kion from danger.

episodes.name: The Mbali Fields Migration
episodes.overview: Kion and the Guard must lead a large herd through the Outlands to find a less crowded grazing ground.

episodes.name: Bunga and the King
episodes.overview: When Bunga and Simba are trapped underground, they discover a shared family background – they were both raised by Timon and Pumbaa.

episodes.name: The Imaginary Okapi
episodes.overview: When Beshte befriends a shy okapi, the Lion Guard thinks Beshte has an imaginary friend

episodes.name: Too Many Termites
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard mistakenly chase off aardwolves instead of hyenas and the Pride Lands become overrun with termites.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Galagos
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard helps a leopard named Badili stand up to a bully who is challenging his territory.

episodes.name: Janja's New Crew
episodes.overview: Janja replaces Chungu and Cheezi with two new hyenas in an attempt to sideline the Lion Guard.

episodes.name: Baboons!
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard rescues a baby baboon and Fuli returns the baboon to its mother.

episodes.name: Beware the Zimwi
episodes.overview: When tales of a mysterious creature plague the Pride Lands, the Guard must conquer their fears and track down the elusive beast.

episodes.name: Lions of the Outlands
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard must choose whether to side with the hyenas or the lions when Jasiri, the good hyena, asks for help.

episodes.name: Never Roar Again
episodes.overview: Fearing he has lost control of his roar, Kion vows to never use it again.

episodes.name: The Lost Gorillas
episodes.overview: The Guard helps two buffoonish Gorilla princes return to their home in the snowy Rwenzori Mountains.

episodes.name: The Trail to Udugu
episodes.overview: While Nala takes Kion and Kiara on a trip to teach them the importance of working together, Simba is left in charge of the Lion Guard.

episodes.name: Ono's Idol
episodes.overview: Ono meets his idol, legendary eagle Hadithi, and learns that his hero isn't what he expected.

episodes.name: Beshte and the Hippo Lanes
episodes.overview: Beshte's dad is injured while creating "Hippo Lanes," so Beshte must step in and take over the job.

episodes.name: Ono the Tickbird
episodes.overview: While Ono fills in as a Rhino's seeing-eye bird, the rest of the Lion Guard helps by getting the rhino and tick-bird to resolve their differences.

episodes.name: Babysitter Bunga
episodes.overview: The rest of the Lion Guard is stunned when Bunga becomes the go-to babysitter for all the Pride Lands' parents.

episodes.name: The Savannah Summit
episodes.overview: While Simba gathers the animal leaders for a Savannah Summit, the Lion Guard learns of a plot against Twiga the giraffe.

episodes.name: The Traveling Baboon Show
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard chase away a baboon comedy troupe that has been distracting the other animals with their antics and stealing their food.

episodes.name: Ono and the Egg
episodes.overview: Ono begrudgingly becomes the protector of a cuckoo bird's egg left in his nest and chases off an African harrier hawk who has come to the Pride Lands to hunt for tasty new treats.

episodes.name: The Rise of Scar
episodes.overview: The Guard meets Rafiki's new apprentice Monkiki. Meanwhile, Ushari and the hyenas team up to seek the help of the Pride Lands' greatest villain, Scar.

episodes.name: Let Sleeping Crocs Lie
episodes.overview: After the Lion Guard accidentally wakes the aestivating crocodiles, the crocs are furious they have to suffer through the dry season!

episodes.name: Swept Away
episodes.overview: When Beshte ends up alone in the Outlands, Scar uses the opportunity to attack the Lion Guard's strongest member.

episodes.name: Rafiki's New Neighbors
episodes.overview: When a noisy bachelor herd moves in next door to Rafiki's tree, the Lion Guard try to help the animals find new homes.

episodes.name: Rescue in the Outlands
episodes.overview: When Jasiri and two hyena cubs are in danger in the Outlands, the Guard enlists the help of Thurston the Zebra to repel a tsetse fly infestation slowing down their rescue efforts.

episodes.name: The Ukumbusho Tradition
episodes.overview: Makini and the Guard are excited to attend their first Ukumbusho but bees threaten to ruin the important celebration!

episodes.name: The Bite of Kenge
episodes.overview: To help the hyenas steal melons, a Monitor Lizard bites Kion, Fuli and Beshte which temporarily paralyzes them!

episodes.name: Timon and Pumbaa's Christmas
episodes.overview: Bunga and the Lion Guard enlist the help of other animals to perform "The Twelve Ways of Christmas" so Timon and Pumbaa can have a "real" Christmas.

episodes.name: The Morning Report
episodes.overview: When Scar has the hyenas trap and interrogate Zazu, the Guard must rescue him.

episodes.name: The Golden Zebra
episodes.overview: Facing a water shortage in the Pride Lands, the Lion Guard must appease zebra leader, Dhahabu, to gain access to a new watering hole.

episodes.name: The Little Guy
episodes.overview: Beshte makes friends with a little gecko named Hodari who wants to be a crocodile more than anything else in the world!

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.overview: When the guard is up against two attacks at once, Kion enlists the help of Tamaa the Drongo to help them be in two places at once.

episodes.name: The Scorpion's Sting
episodes.overview: After a scorpion sent by Scar stings Simba, the Guard needs to face every villain in the Outlands to get a cure for the king!

episodes.name: The Wisdom of Kongwe
episodes.overview: Fuli and Makini are tasked with escorting one of the Pride Lands' wisest animals, a tortoise named Kongwe, back to Pride Rock to meet with the King.

episodes.name: The Kilio Valley Fire
episodes.overview: After Scar's minions set fire to the Kilio Valley, the misplaced elephants are forced to the Pride Lands and create chaos amongst the other herds.

episodes.name: Undercover Kinyonga
episodes.overview: A color-changing chameleon named Kinyonga helps the Guard by spying on Scar in the Outlands.

episodes.name: Cave of Secrets
episodes.overview: After discovering a mysterious cave that may hold the key to defeating Scar, the Guard must face dangerous hazards to uncover its secrets.

episodes.name: The Zebra Mastermind
episodes.overview: After hearing Thurston boast that he's the brains behind the Lion Guard, the villains of the Outlands capture him to find a way to defeat the Guard.

episodes.name: The Hyena Resistance
episodes.overview: Jasiri offers to help the Guard battle Scar by forming a Hyena Resistance in the Outlands.

episodes.name: The Underground Adventure
episodes.overview: Kion, Kiara, Bunga, Tiifu and Zuri must journey underground through aardvark tunnels to escape a fire.

episodes.name: Beshte and the Beast
episodes.overview: A gorilla warrior named Shujaa comes to help the Lion Guard in the battle against Scar.

episodes.name: Pride Landers Unite!
episodes.overview: Kion, is tasked with gathering the Pride Landers to prepare them for their fight against Scar.

episodes.name: The Queen's Visit
episodes.overview: After being threatened by Scar's attacks, Queen Dhahabu asks Fuli, Tiifu and Zuri to become her permanent personal guards.

episodes.name: The Fall of Mizimu Grove
episodes.overview: Scar makes an appearance when Timon and Pumbaa decide to put on a show in Mizimu Grove.

episodes.name: Fire From the Sky
episodes.overview: To combat the vultures dropping flame sticks from the sky, the Lion Guard seeks help from Hadithi and a Martial eagle named Anga.

episodes.name: Battle for the Pride Lands
episodes.overview: After Kion and Ono are injured in an attempt to defeat Scar in the battle for the Pride Lands, the Lion Guard must embark on a journey to the Tree of Life to help them regain their strength.

episodes.name: The Harmattan
episodes.overview: The Guard encounters a powerful dust storm!

episodes.name: The Accidental Avalanche
episodes.overview: Kion makes amends when he loses control of his Roar.

episodes.name: Ghost of the Mountain
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard brings peace to a pack of Red Pandas.

episodes.name: Marsh of Mystery
episodes.overview: Makini chases mysterious blue lights!

episodes.name: Dragon Island
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard encounters Komodo Dragons!

episodes.name: Journey of Memories
episodes.overview: When Makini's memories of her first journey to the Tree of Life result in getting the Guard lost in the desert, they must learn to travel by night and navigate by the stars.

episodes.name: The Race to Tuliza
episodes.overview: Fuli gets lost and is forced to race a male cheetah.

episodes.name: Mama Binturong
episodes.overview: The Guard searches for Makini's stolen staff.

episodes.name: Friends to the End
episodes.overview: Ever closer to the Tree of Life, Kion's scar bothers him more than ever, causing Bunga to think that the venom in Kion's body is turning him evil.

episodes.name: The Tree of Life
episodes.overview: The Lion Guard is thrilled to be at the end of its journey to the Tree of Life, but the celebration is cut short when the Night Pride mistakes the Guard for a threat and attacks.

episodes.name: The River of Patience
episodes.overview: While Kion heals at the Tree of Life, villains attack. Kion is eager to defend the Tree but must learn to focus and find patience in order to heal fully.

episodes.name: Little Old Ginterbong
episodes.overview: Mama Binturong pretends to be an animal in need and enters the Tree of Life to gather information for the villains.

episodes.name: Poa the Destroyer
episodes.overview: While touring the Tree of Life, looking to make new friends, Beshte accidentally frightens the community.

episodes.name: Long Live the Queen
episodes.overview: When Rani worries she isn't ready to become queen, Makini reveals the special gift Queen Janna left for her.

episodes.name: The Lake of Reflection
episodes.overview: When Kion's confidence as a leader is lacking, the Lake of Reflection flashes back to a young Lion Guard, helping Kion remember his past and embrace his role as a leader.

episodes.name: Triumph of the Roar
episodes.overview: When a new army of predators seizes control of the Tree of Life, it's up to Kion to channel his Roar to drive out the bad guys.

episodes.name: Journey to the Pride Lands
episodes.overview: After learning that the Pride Lands are threatened, Kion uses the Roar to help the Lion Guard return home as soon as possible.

episodes.name: Return to the Pride Lands
episodes.overview: When the Lion Guard returns to the Pride Lands, they discover Vitani has formed her own Lion Guard in their absence.
